channel.title: Barrows
channel.description: Mmm, let's see.... I added my version of barrows on my new server.. There's one problem thoughh.... After I put it in, I get this error, not with compiling though. When I dig at the ground, i go under, but I keep digging even when I'm by the coffin. I tried moving doesn't work. So there any way to fix this?

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

Mmmk… This is my code before

case 952: //Spade DIG!!! if (barrowspicked == false) { barrowspicked = true; if (barrowstunnel == 1) { barrowstunnel1(); } else if (barrowstunnel == 2) { barrowstunnel2(); } else if (barrowstunnel == 3) { barrowstunnel3(); } else if (barrowstunnel == 4) { barrowstunnel4(); } else if (barrowstunnel == 5) { barrowstunnel5(); } else if (barrowstunnel == 6) { barrowstunnel6(); } } else if (barrowspicked == true) { setAnimation(831); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if (isInArea(3570, 3302, 3579, 3293)) { Dharok(); } else if (isInArea(3561, 3292, 3568, 3285)) { Ahrim(); } else if (isInArea(3553, 3301, 3561, 3294)) { Verac(); } else if (isInArea(3550, 3287, 3557, 3278)) { Torag(); } else if (isInArea(3562, 3279, 3569, 3273)) { Karil(); } else if (isInArea(3571, 3285, 3582, 3278)) { Guthan(); } else { sendMessage("You find nothing here."); } } break;

Do I just put this

resetAnimation();

In here?

setAnimation(831); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

So it would look like this

setAnimation(831); updateRequired = true; resetAnimation(); appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Read full topic
